meanings.definition: A person with whom one has a mutual friendship or social media connection.
meanings.sent1: My mutuals on social media always like my posts.
meanings.sent2: I have many mutuals who support me online.
meanings.sent3: My mutuals and I always share funny memes with each other.
meanings.sent4: Being mutuals with someone is like having a digital pen pal.
meanings.sent5: I consider my mutuals as my online buddies.

meanings.definition: A financial institution owned by its members and operated for their benefit.
meanings.sent1: The credit union is a mutuals organization that helps its members save money.
meanings.sent2: I trust my mutuals at the bank to handle my finances.
meanings.sent3: The mutuals at the credit union always greet me with a smile.
meanings.sent4: Being part of a mutuals bank feels like being part of a big family.
meanings.sent5: I appreciate the services provided by my mutuals at the credit union.

meanings.definition: Shared in common by two or more parties.
meanings.sent1: The mutuals decision to go to the park was a great idea.
meanings.sent2: We reached a mutuals agreement on the project timeline.
meanings.sent3: It was mutuals between us to split the bill evenly.
meanings.sent4: Our mutuals interest in hiking brought us together.
meanings.sent5: The mutuals decision to have a picnic was enjoyable for everyone.
